name: Pink Onion
author: Bleu L.
description: Have been here 3x in the last 3 months - that's saying a lot since I love trying new places and don't get to the same place often.  That's how much I loved it here - I kept coming back because I wanted to take my friends here.  The bolognese pasta, mushroom pizza, and warm romaine salad are amazing.  The only reason I didn't give this place 5-stars is that the first time I went, they forgot one appetizer (meatballs) - they charged us but just forgot to give it to us.  We didn't notice until we left but didn't complain because we were so full from the other great food.  The second time, they ran out of the bolognese which is why I went there so that was a bummer.  So actually the food is 5-stars, the service about 4-stars - but can easily be 5-stars as they perfect everything.  Yum - highly recommend!
